pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 24, 2016:

Toronto

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with families in Toronto to discuss Budget 2016.

Trinity Community Recreation Centre
155 Crawford St.
Toronto, ON

Notes for Media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Trinity Community Recreation Centre
155 Crawford St.
Toronto, ON

Notes for Media:

  • Open media coverage


Media appearance

CP24 Live with Stephanie Smyth

1:15 p.m. - Live


Please note: all times are in Eastern Daylight Time.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
